Class Inventory

java.lang.Object
Inventory
public class Inventory extends Object
This is a program to manage the inventory of a fictional store. Text documents are used to convey the tools' info. Additionally, an order form is used to print out an order for new parts if the inventory gets too low. Inventory class is the backbone of the program. It contains the major functions used for searching and managing the inventory of the shop
Since:
July 11, 2021
